Texts.Eng:

^cyan;+^white;30 ^cyan;EP^gray;, ^cyan;Extremely Caffeinated^gray;, ^red;-^white;30 ^red;Defense^gray;, ^red;Insanity^gray;, ^red;Poisoned ^gray;(^white;220s^gray;)^reset; ^blue;Madness Gain^reset; 3

你可能不应该被看到随身携带这个。
^cyan;+^white;30^cyan;EP^gray;^cyan;极度含咖啡因^gray;^red;-^white;30 ^red;；防御^gray;^red;疯狂^gray;^red;中毒^gray;（^white;220s^gray;）^reset;^blue;癫狂^reset;3.
